publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4931 Iain Smith on behalf of the Education Committee: Early Years Inquiry Report—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Education Committee’s 7th Report, 2006 (Session 2): Early Years (SP Paper 596).
